articles.content: In context: Wear OS watches (formerly Android Wear) have had to fight an uphill battle ever since the first one landed in 2014. For a while, they seemed like the next big thing after the smartphone, … [+2675 chars]

articles.title: Apple is reportedly canceling some Arcade contracts to focus on ‘engagement’ - The Verge
articles.description: According to a report from Bloomberg, Apple has canceled several Arcade game contracts because they lack the level of engagement it wants. This has caused financial woes at some studios.
articles.content:
Apple wants games that people will play more often
Photo by Amelia Holowaty Krales / The Verge
